name: Teletransportation Paradox
description:
Submitted for GMTKGJ2019! 

The teletransportation paradox asks the question: "if you clone yourself, which one is the real you?"

In this game, you have the ability to clone yourself forward in space. But watch out... the universe only allows one to survive. Your clones will hunt each other and you out until there is ONLY ONE left. 

Collect as many of the yellow disks as you can before getting caught. Each time you pick up a disk, a wall will form. You must clone yourself forward to pass through walls! Clones destroying each other will cause the walls to crumble. 

Move - Arrow keys

Space - Clone forward in space (you can teleport through 2 layers of wall at once)
